author: andreas
content: Well, actually it's not Photomatix Pro, it's what you do with it. This is not automatic, and really what it does automatically, has become worse in the last few versions. It's just that it is very configurable, and when you know what you have to do to get a good basis for further processing in Photoshop, you can make very natural looking images.
